description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Wrote 'Across Space And Time' on ecosystems and curated 'Groom Your Ecosystem' course.
